title: Agreement with Casa de Salud for the Needs Assessment Project.

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 123      INTRODUCED BY: ALDERMAN STEPHEN CONWAY  An ordinance authorizing and directing the Mayor, on the behalf of the City of St. Louis, to enter into agreements with Casa de Salud for the Needs Assessment project entitled Salud de Nuestra Población funded by the Missouri Foundation for Health, and authorizing the Mayor, upon approval of the Board of Estimate and Apportionment, to expend any funds received by said agreement to fulfill the obligations of the agreement, and containing an emergency clause.
